sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import API from '../../api'; import { Users, BookOpen, GraduationCap, TrendingUp, Clock, Award, ClipboardList, Activity } from 'lucide-react'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'; const COLORS = ['#312E81', '#6366F1', '#818CF8', '#A5B4FC', '#C7D2FE']; export default function AdminDashboard() { const [data, setData] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { API.get('/api/analytics/overview').then(r => setData(r.data)).catch(() => {}).finally(() => setLoading(false)); }, []); if (loading) return
; if (!data) return

Failed to load dashboard data.

; const stats = [ { label: 'Total Students', value: data.total_students, icon: Users, color: '#312E81', bg: '#EEF2FF' }, { label: 'Total Instructors', value: data.total_instructors, icon: GraduationCap, color: '#7C3AED', bg: '#F5F3FF' }, { label: 'Total Courses', value: data.total_courses, icon: BookOpen, color: '#059669', bg: '#ECFDF5' }, { label: 'Active Enrollments', value: data.active_enrollments, icon: TrendingUp, color: '#D97706', bg: '#FFFBEB' }, { label: 'Completion Rate', value: `${data.completion_rate}%`, icon: Award, color: '#2563EB', bg: '#EFF6FF' }, { label: 'Avg Progress', value: `${data.avg_progress}%`, icon: Activity, color: '#DC2626', bg: '#FEF2F2' }, { label: 'Pending Reviews', value: data.pending_submissions, icon: ClipboardList, color: '#7C3AED', bg: '#F5F3FF' }, { label: 'Certificates', value: data.total_certificates, icon: Award, color: '#059669', bg: '#ECFDF5' }, ]; const pieData = [ { name: 'Active', value: data.active_enrollments }, { name: 'Completed', value: data.completed_enrollments }, ]; return (

Dashboard

Welcome back! Here's your platform overview.

{s.label}

))}

{a.user_name} {a.action.replace('_', ' ')}

{new Date(a.timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}

))} {(!data.recent_activity || data.recent_activity.length === 0) &&

}

Enrollment Status
